description: Identifier of the report this parameter belongs to; typically a foreign key to the report definition.
System key for the parameter used in queries/templates and API calls; must be unique per report.
Display or evaluation order of the parameter within a report's parameter list.
User-facing caption shown for the parameter in screens or printed output.
Data type of the parameter value, guiding validation and rendering.
Maximum allowed length for the parameter's value when applicable; null if not constrained.
Free-text explanation of the parameter's purpose or usage to aid users and admins.
Value automatically applied when the user or system does not supply the parameter.
Reference to the source of allowed values for this parameter; likely controls selectable options; confirm with SME.
Configuration used to populate or validate the parameter via a web service call; exact behavior may vary by implementation; confirm with SME.
User or process that created the parameter record.
Timestamp when the parameter record was created.
User or process that last modified the parameter record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the parameter record.
Indicates whether the parameter must be provided to run the report.
